Level 16
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 16
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, January 5, 2002 - 08:55 pm:

LEVEL 16

Ok,this stage is congested with all those junk of bats pictures,which do not let you to create boxes on them,which is a whole bunch of non-sense. So at the start of the stages.move left one,create the box,and hop on it. Create a box,on both yoru left,and on your right,and Jump up the box on your left. As you can see,on the top is another blank place,not filled with other the non-sensical batties. Create a box on that space. Now go back down to the first box,and jump up the right box. As another empty space is there,create a box there,and jump on it.Jump up while creating a box both on your right and left. Jump down and create a box,floating in mid-air just above the ground. Go back and stand on the first box,AS YOU CAN SEE,YOU HAVE TO DESTROY SOME OF THE BOXES,TO STAND ON IT,THAN CREATE THE BOXES,IN PLACE AGAIN,SO DUN ASK QUESTIONS,AS IT'S PURE LOGIC. Than climb up the boxes,and jump down on the mid-air box. Create another box on yoru rgiht,and climb yoru way up. Now you are at the top layer,and you should jump from box to box,finally jumping and grabbing the key,than jump down,and do the same thing again,but stop at the box,hovering in mid air(Did I use the right word?lol). Stand on the edge,and create a box by jumping up,facing left,and after that,jump up on the high crate,VERY HARD WORK,IF YOU DUNNO HOW TO DO IT,AS IT CAN BE QUITE HIGH. After that face right,create another box,and jump on it,than while ducking down low,create another box on your right,and walk your way to the Exit. GREAT JOB.
